segments.text: Can I get you any dessert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to try the blueberry pie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent choice . ( He brings her the pie . After she finishes , the waiter comes back . ) Would you like anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm stuffed . I'm ready for the check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . Thank you and have a nice evening .
segments.speaker: S1
